subtitle: This recipe goes to show the fantastic results that can be achieved in the microwave - even with delicate flavours like seafood.

method.text: Melt half the butter for 1 min in a large casserole dish. Stir in the onion. Cover and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 3-4 min. Stir in the rice, cover and cook for 1 min.

Add about half the stock to the rice. Stir well. Add the seasoning and turmeric. Cover and cook on 100% (FULL) power for about 12 min, adding extra stock as necessary, stirring 2-3 times during cooking. Leave to stand.

Heat the rest of the butter for 1 min to melt. Add the mushrooms, squid and prawns. Cover and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 1 min. Stir in the squid and prawns and cook for 2-3 min. Leave to stand for 2 min.
Place the mussels in a bowl with a little water. Cover with cling film, pierce and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 2-3 min until opened (discard any which have not opened).
Fork over the rice and stir in the melted butter. Add the mushroom and shellfish mixture. Serve hot.

title: Seafood pilaf - microwave
